body:
Vidya.

You can download the "Radiance Tutorial" by Axel Jacobs here:

http://luminance.londonmet.ac.uk/learnix/docs.shtml

There are also a few other documents but the tutorial is a very
good start especially with regard to the command line.

Regards,
Thomas

On Fri, Nov 19, 2010 at 3:16 PM, vidya gowda <vidyacg80@gmail.com> wrote:
